title: Tuesday Telescope: A stellar duo stars in a nearby galaxy
summary: Side-by-side views bring new insight into these intriguing clusters.

title: Commercial space industry groups ask Congress to fully fund TraCSS
summary:
An industry coalition is asking congressional appropriators to reject the administration’s proposal to terminate the Commerce Department’s space traffic coordination system.
The post Commercial space industry groups ask Congress to fully fund TraCSS appeared first on SpaceNews.

title: Muon Space names new leadership to advance role in government market
summary:
Former Space Development Agency official Paula Trimble has joined the company as vice president of government affairs and strategy
The post Muon Space names new leadership to advance role in government market appeared first on SpaceNews.

title: From ESA lab to a historic drone race win
summary: An autonomous drone has beaten human drone racing champions in an international competition for the first time. A team of scientists from Delft University of Technology has taken first place at the A2RL Drone Championship in Abu Dhabi – and the AI taking their drone to victory got off to a flying start in the lab of the European Space Agency’s Advanced Concepts Team just a few years prior.

title: ESA selects five companies for next phase of launcher competition
summary:
The European Space Agency has selected five launch vehicle startups to proceed to the next phase of a competition where they could receive contracts for satellite launches and upgraded vehicles.
The post ESA selects five companies for next phase of launcher competition appeared first on SpaceNews.

title: Live coverage: SpaceX to launch 28 Starlink satellites on Falcon 9 rocket from Cape Canaveral
summary: The Starlink 10-28 mission will deliver 28 broadband internet satellites into low Earth orbit. SpaceX is targeting liftoff of its Falcon 9 rocket from pad 40 at Cape Canaveral Space Force Station at 4:21 a.m. EDT (0821 UTC).

title: Curiosity Blog, Sol 4588: Ridges and troughs

title: Working in Space
